column1: Kata Robata////Kata is a a system of individual training exercises for practitioners of karate and other martial arts
column2: or an individual training exercise in karate and other martial arts. + Robata: A charcoal grill used to prepare Japanese food for customers seated around the cooking area
column3: or a restaurant featuring such a grill. Kata Robata is a perfect reflection of this Japanese feel that you long for without losing the bourgeoisie yearning for an atmosphere but not too much. I came here with a coworker for their happy hour. Their happy hour is very straight forward with no frills and the food looks and tastes great.
